entities.label: Individual Investor
entities.shortDescription: Households balancing risk capacity, liquidity needs, and values across taxable and retirement accounts.
entities.timeHorizon: Varies by life stage (emergency reserves, retirement horizon, legacy goals)
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Income replacement withdrawals begin after retirement; otherwise focused on accumulation.
entities.governanceStyle: Self-directed choices informed by advisors, custodians, or accountability groups.

entities.label: Corporate Pension Plan
entities.shortDescription: ERISA-regulated defined-benefit plans stewarded by trustees for participant benefit.
entities.timeHorizon: Long-dated liability profile (20-30 years) with de-risking glidepaths
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Benefit obligations determined actuarially; payouts tied to participant retirements.
entities.governanceStyle: Named fiduciaries and investment committees operating under ERISA documentation and prudence rules.
keyConstraints: ERISA fiduciary duty and exclusive-benefit rule

entities.label: Public Pension System
entities.shortDescription: State and local retirement systems balancing fiduciary duty with statutory and public accountability.
entities.timeHorizon: Intergenerational horizon with actuarial smoothing across economic cycles
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Benefit cash flows linked to retiree demographics and statutory formulas.
entities.governanceStyle: Boards comprised of trustees, beneficiaries, and public appointees under open-meeting and disclosure statutes.

entities.label: Endowment
entities.shortDescription: Perpetual investment pools supporting academic or mission-driven institutions.
entities.timeHorizon: Perpetual capital with spending rules balancing current and future beneficiaries
entities.typicalWithdrawal: 4-5% policy spending rate averaged over market cycles
entities.governanceStyle: Board of trustees or investment committee aligns mission with fiduciary prudence and donor intent.
keyConstraints: Liquidity for capital commitments and spending

entities.label: Private Foundation
entities.shortDescription: Grantmaking entities required to distribute funds annually while preserving mission alignment.
entities.timeHorizon: Perpetual or time-limited based on charter
entities.governanceStyle: Board/trustees with philanthropic mandate and IRS compliance responsibilities.

entities.label: Insurance Company Portfolio
entities.shortDescription: Balance sheets managed to meet policyholder liabilities under risk-based capital rules.
entities.timeHorizon: Matched to liability cash flows, typically medium-term with precise duration targets
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Liability-driven payouts; investment income supports statutory reserves.
entities.governanceStyle: Investment committees with actuarial, risk, and regulatory oversight.

entities.label: Central Bank Reserve Portfolio
entities.shortDescription: Official-sector investors balancing monetary policy mandates with reserve safety and liquidity.
entities.timeHorizon: Mandate-driven; reserves managed for stability rather than return maximization
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Interventions and liquidity operations rather than fixed spending
entities.governanceStyle: Independent policy boards supported by reserve management teams and statutory mandates.

entities.label: Municipal Investment Pool
entities.shortDescription: City, county, or state treasuries investing public funds under safety, liquidity, and transparency mandates.
entities.timeHorizon: Short- to medium-term cash flows aligned to budget cycles
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Liquidity needs for operations, debt service, and capital projects.
entities.governanceStyle: Treasurer and investment committee operating under adopted investment policy statements and public reporting.

entities.label: Sovereign Wealth Fund
entities.shortDescription: State-owned investment funds pursuing stabilization, savings, or development mandates.
entities.timeHorizon: Depends on mandate: near-term stabilization, intergenerational saving, or long-term development
entities.typicalWithdrawal: Mandate-driven distributions for budget support or development projects.
entities.governanceStyle: Government sponsor with professional management aligned to Santiago Principles.
